sql.name: queryXhCreditAuditList
sql.sqlString: select a.CREDIT_AUDIT_REPORT,/*信审报告*/ a.CREDIT_REFUSE_REASON,/*拒贷原因*/ a.OUT_VISIT_FEE,/*外访费*/ a.CREDIT_ALL_RATE,/*综合费率*/ a.CREDIT_MONTH,/*授信期限*/ a.CREDIT_AMOUNT,/*授信金额*/ a.CREDIT_STATE,/*信审状态：0信审未结束 1信审结束*/ a.CREDIT_RESULT,/*信审结果：1通过、0拒绝*/ a.CREDIT_TYPE,/*信审类型：初审、复审、终审*/ a.LOAN_APPLY_ID,/*借款申请ID 外键*/ a.ID,/*主键ID*/ a.ID from XH_CREDIT_AUDIT a where 1=1 $sql
